title: Poster, 1980
inscribed: Printed in purple ink, lower margin: POSTER CONCEPT AND DESIGN: WOODY PIRTLE, INC./PRINTING: RIVERSIDE PRESS/PAPER: OLMSTED-KIRK PAPER CO./TYPOGRAPHY: SOUTHWESTER TYPOGRAPHICS INC.
description: Poster depicts night seen, dark blue sky with moon and stars positioned to look like portrait of William Shakespeare, below greenery and flower. Lower area, yellow and purple text: SHAKESPEARE / FESTIVAL OF DALLAS/80 / IN REPERTORY JULY 11-27 / THE TAMING OF THE SHREW / THE MERCHANT OF VENICE; BAND SHELL FAIR PARK / ADMISSION FREE / CATES OPEN 7:15 P.M. / CURTAIN 8:15 P.M. / NO PERFORMANCE MONDAYS. Lower margin, in script: Shakespearean Nights.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, 1980.Lithograph on paper. Gift of Various Donors. 1981-29-28.
